# QITE_CD
QITE inspired cd driving


### usage 

```python 
import quspin
import quspin_qite
```

## run the code 
```python 
cd examples/QITE
python run_qite.py 
# python run_vqite.py
```


# acknowledge
The implementation are adapted from https://github.com/mariomotta/QITE/blob/master/code_v4/qite.py and https://github.com/Plmono/RL-qite/blob/main/gym_cut/envs/foo_env.py#L84-L142
